title: Do I need to get tested for Covid-19 if I'm vaccinated? - Mint
description: No, you can skip routine testing, with some exceptions..Even if you get an infection, you'll be less likely to spread it to others and any symptoms will likely be milder
content:

title: Nod for film, TV shoots in Mumbai if daily COVID-19 case count under control: Uddhav Thackeray - Moneycontrol.com
description: In a virtual interaction with the representatives of the film and television industry, he appealed to them to cooperate with the government in the measures being taken to fight the pandemic.
content:
Maharashtra Chief Minister Uddhav Thackeray on Sunday said permissions for film and TV shootings in Mumbai would be given if the city's daily coronavirus case count is brought under control.

title: COVID-19: These Indian states ease lockdown from today; check details - Moneycontrol
description: Following a decline in daily case count, states such as Delhi, Tamil Nadu, Uttar Pradesh, Maharashtra and Gujarat have eased lockdown restrictions.
content:
Several Indian states have started to relax lockdown curbs as coronavirus cases across the country continued to drop.

title: India administers over 23 cr COVID vaccine doses - ANI News
description: New Delhi [India], June 5 (ANI): Amid its ongoing fight against the COVID-19 pandemic, India has administered more than 23 crores (23,10,89,241) vaccine doses till 7 pm on Saturday.
